/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are predominantly white and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
